content: knit one ws row discarding first and last markers the needles place marker and join for working in the round work in k1 p1 rib for 1 1 1 5 1 5 inches and front leg openings bind off all sts rs k 8 10 12 15 sts break yarn leaving a 3-5 yard tail sew seam from neck to tummy weave in ends cut another 3-5 yard piece of yarn and reserve using the ball of yarn bind off 8 9 10 12 sts knit to last 16 19 22 27 sts add reserved piece of yarn bind off 8 9 10 12 sts knit to end work is now divided into 3 sections each with their own yarn work all 3 sections for 7 9 11 15 row next row rs knit across first section cast on 8 9 10 12 sts drop piece of yarn pick up ball of yarn and knit across middle section cast on 8 9 10 12 sts and knit to end with ball of yarn continue in pattern for 9 11 13 17 more row all text and images property of joann rogers and jojo knits all rights reserved 2012
